Further to our earlier communication, we have not yet received any inputs on the tracker:  Follow up tracker_Business Continuity and Resilience Audit_3.4.2025.xlsx <https://mctfze.sharepoint.com/:x:/s/FollowUp667-BusinessContinuityandResilience/EazNAJ1rFglNmdLXregOxeQBZpdNnBu0eDsX_rWNMpjNlw?e=xeuWOF> . 

 

There are currently 15 actions past their implementation timelines with no status updates recorded. We kindly request you to:

 

1.	Provide your updates in column “N” of the tracker
2.	Upload the relevant supporting documents to the shared folder:  Supporting Documents <https://mctfze.sharepoint.com/:f:/s/FollowUp667-BusinessContinuityandResilience/Ei9iC5_vzL5PlCCIKlpiBz4BXuqE98zvO3c0v9fAumYckg?e=eZ4POf> 

 

If any action remains unimplemented or is partially implemented, please include a revised timeline for completion.

 

Additionally, refer to Column “P” – Auditor Remarks for specific details on the information required to close each action. We would appreciate receiving your inputs by Wednesday, 11th June.

 

Feel free to reach out if you require any clarification.

Regards,

Sent: Monday, 21 April 2025 11:08 AM
To: Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com>; Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Philip Leonard <Philip.Leonard@chalhoub.com>; Ahmad Dit Shikh Ard <Ahmad.Shikhard@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Damian Brown <Damian.Brown@chalhoub.com>; Emma Elkarout <Emma.Elkarout@chalhoub.com>

Subject: Internal Audit Follow up| Wave-1 2025| Business Continuity and Resilience Audit

 

Dear all,

 

Trust you are doing well.

 

As previously communicated in the 2025 Audit calendar, the first wave of follow up and action tracking is coming up in May. This objective is to track and validate the progress on the agreed action plans for all the audits delivered since Q4 2024 to date.

chunks.text:
As previously communicated in the 2025 Audit calendar, the first wave of follow up and action tracking is coming up in May. This objective is to track and validate the progress on the agreed action plans for all the audits delivered since Q4 2024 to date.

 

To support this, we have uploaded the action tracker file  Follow up tracker_Business Continuity and Resilience Audit_3.4.2025.xlsx <https://mctfze.sharepoint.com/:x:/s/FollowUp667-BusinessContinuityandResilience/EazNAJ1rFglNmdLXregOxeQBZpdNnBu0eDsX_rWNMpjNlw?e=y1Fws0>  in a dedicated Teams channel. Access has been granted to all action owners.

This file is a replica of the Final audit report/issue summary and includes all findings and agreed action plans with their due dates and responsible person. Please take note of the below: 

1.       Provide an update in column “N” “Follow up response/Action Update” for the due actions. You need to explain the progress on the action.

2.       Between May-June, we will validate these responses by requesting for supporting evidence.

3.       You only need to provide responses for actions that are due for completion as of end of April, you can disregard any actions planned for future dates. 

4.       All other cells are locked to avoid any confusion.

 

We request you to provide your updates by 30th April. 

Kindly go through the file and let us know if you need any support or have any questions.  

 

Thank you in anticipation!

 

Warm Regards,

DIVYA MITTAL​​​​

MANAGER ‑ INTERNAL AUDIT

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

		
 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/>
